item.title: Countdown to New Year 2026 in Des Moines
item.description:

125       days

-
3019      hours

-
181196    minutes

-
10871761  seconds

+
3011      hours

+
180717    minutes

+
10843033  seconds

 

 

-
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([San Jose, California](/worldclock/usa/san-jose) time)

+
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([Des Moines](/worldclock/usa/des-moines) time)

 

 
[](/counters/fullscreen.html?mode=a&year=2026)

 

-
125 days, 19 hours, 56 minutes, 1 second

+
125 days, 11 hours, 57 minutes, 13 seconds

 

-
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([San Jose, California](/worldclock/usa/san-jose) time)

+
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([Des Moines](/worldclock/usa/des-moines) time)

 

 
[One hour wrong? Daylight Saving Time!](/countdown/one-hour-off)

 

-
Current time is Thursday, August 28, 2025 at 5:03:59 am [PDT](/time/zones/pdt) (local time in [](/worldclock/usa/san-jose)[San Jose, California](/worldclock/usa/san-jose))

+
Current time is Thursday, August 28, 2025 at 1:02:47 pm [CDT](/time/zones/cdt) (local time in [](/worldclock/usa/des-moines)[Des Moines](/worldclock/usa/des-moines))
